problems.title: Charging Problems & Solutions
problems.description: Troubleshooting and fixing charging issues with Dyson V15 not charging.
solution_steps: Clean the metal contacts on both vacuum and charger
Check if the charger LED indicator is working
Inspect the charging port for debris or damage
Test with a different charger if available
If charger is faulty, replace with genuine Dyson charger

required_parts.name: Dyson V15 not charging Charger
required_parts.search_query: Dyson V15 not charging charger replacement

faqs.question: Is it worth fixing the issue on a Dyson V15 not charging?
faqs.answer: Yes. A replacement part typically costs significantly less than a new $375 vacuum, and extending the life of your Dyson is eco-friendly.

faqs.question: How do I know if my Dyson V15 not charging needs a new part?
faqs.answer: Common signs include strange noises and the device failing to complete a cleaning cycle.

faqs.question: Can I replace the part on my Dyson V15 not charging myself?
faqs.answer: Yes, this is a user-serviceable repair. Most replacements generally require just a screwdriver and about 10-20 minutes of time.
